Package internal.database

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TupleGenerator
    This interface can be used for generating tuples to populate a database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BpTree<K extends Comparable<K>,V>
    This class provides B+Tree maps.
    Conversions
    This class provides methods for converting Java's primitive data types into byte arrays.
    ExtHash<K,V>
    This class provides hash maps that use the Extendable Hashing algorithm.
    FileList
    This class allows data tuples/tuples (e.g., those making up a relational table) to be stored in a random access file.
    KeyType
    The KeyType class provides a key type for handling both non-composite and composite keys.
    LinHash<K,V>
    This class provides hash maps that use the Linear Hashing algorithm.
    MovieDB
    The MovieDB class makes a Movie Database.
    String2Type
    This class provides a static method for converting a String into any type that has a constructor which takes a single String as an argument (e.g., Integer (String s)).
    Table
    This class implements relational database tables (including attribute names, domains and a list of tuples.
    TestTupleGenerator
    This class tests the TupleGenerator on the Student Registration Database defined in the Kifer, Bernstein and Lewis 2006 database textbook (see figure 3.6).
    TupleGeneratorImpl
    This class is used to populate a database (collection of tables) with randomly generated values that satisfy the following integrity constraints: domain, primary keys and foreign key constraints.
